cfarcaProc DPU External Functions
cfarcaProc DPU External

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the cfarcaProc DPU. More...

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the cfarcaProc DPU.

Function Documentation

int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_config ( DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle  handle,
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Config *  cfarHwaCfg 
)

Description
The function is CFARCAProcHWA DPU configuration function. It saves buffer pointer and configurations including system resources and configures EDMA for runtime range processing.

Precondition
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleCFARCAProcHWA DPU handle
[in]cfarHwaCfgPointer to CFARCAProcHWA configuration data structure
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Definition at line 764 of file cfarcaprochwa.c.

int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_control ( DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle  handle,
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd  cmd,
void *  arg,
uint32_t  argSize 
)

Description
The function is CFARCAProcHWA DPU control function.

Precondition
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleCFARCAProcHWA DPU handle
[in]cmdCFARCAProcHWA DPU control command
[in]argCFARCAProcHWA DPU control argument pointer
[in]argSizeCFARCAProcHWA DPU control argument size
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Definition at line 1064 of file cfarcaprochwa.c.

int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_deinit ( DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle  handle)

Description
The function is CFARCAProcHWA DPU deinitialization function. It frees up the resources allocated during initialization.

Precondition
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleCFARCAProcHWA DPU handle
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Definition at line 1193 of file cfarcaprochwa.c.

DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_init ( DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_InitParams *  initCfg,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is CFARCAProcHWA DPU initialization function. It allocates memory to store its internal data object and returns a handle if it executes successfully.

Parameters
[in]initCfgPointer to initialization configuration
[in]errCodePointer to errCode generates from the API
Return values
Success- valid CFARCAProcHWA handle
Error- NULL

Definition at line 702 of file cfarcaprochwa.c.

int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_process ( DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle  handle,
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_OutParams *  outParams 
)

Description
The function is CFARCAProcHWA DPU process function. It performs CFAR detection using HWA

Precondition
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleCFARCAProcHWA DPU handle
[in]outParamsDPU output parameters
Return values
Success= 0
Error!= 0
